definition: unilateral/one-sided/home remedy/folk prescription(same as 丹方)/single-drug prescription (same as 奇方[ji1 fang1], one of the seven kinds of prescriptions of Chinese medicine 七方[qi1 fang1])/metaphorically. a good solution

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to decide without reference to other parties involved/unilateral decision
collision in which only one party is at fault
pinyin: dan1 fang1 guo4 shi1 peng4 zhuang4

sentences.english: As always, presidential unilateralism puts Congress in a tough position.
sentences.chinese: 总统的单方面决定总是置国会与难堪的境地。

sentences.english: Organic essential oils of fennel, bergamot, verbena and cedarwood essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 茴香，佛手柑，马鞭草，雪松等有机单方精油。

sentences.english: Ban also said it was time for Israel to consider a unilateral ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文也说现在是时候让以色列考虑单方面的停战。

sentences.english: Should it be interactive or should it be one-way?
sentences.chinese: 它是互动的还是单方面？

sentences.english: Pending settlement of the dispute over water, none of the parties may unilaterally alter the existing water regime.
sentences.chinese: 在水事纠纷解决前，当事人不得单方面改变现状。

sentences.english: A one-way friendship will not last too long.
sentences.chinese: 单方面的友谊，是不会持久的。

sentences.english: Autocratic leaders tend to make unilateral decisions, dictate work methods.
sentences.chinese: 专制型领导者倾向于单方面做出决策，支配工作方法。

sentences.english: Finite-element method was choosed to do duty for numerical valuation means .
sentences.chinese: 选择了有限单方元法作为本研究的数值评价方法。

sentences.english: In some cases, decaying food is the least of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 但是有些时候，单方面的食物腐坏可能还只是小问题。

sentences.english: Investors were given a one-way bet.
sentences.chinese: 投资者陷身与一场单方面的赌约中。

sentences.english: The Japanese government expresses its regret that China is unilaterally developing the field, " Chief Cabinet Secretary Takeo Kawamura told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府对中国单方面对其开采表示遗憾。

sentences.english: The decision made by this Commission shall be regarded as final and binding upon both parties.
sentences.chinese: 该委员会的决议是结局的，对于单方均存正在束缚力。

sentences.english: By comparing the two sides can complement each other I have found that Chinese and Western absorb purposes.
sentences.chinese: 经由过程比力我发明中西单方皆可互补，吸纳之用。

sentences.english: Arrestment is not a strategy merely decided by judicatory organ, but a Nash equilibrium which involves the judicatory organ and suspect.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕是一种并非由司法机关单方意志决定的策略行为。

sentences.english: At which time Masonite unilaterally terminated the agreement and ordered Dobson to discontinue his operations.
sentences.chinese: 在本协议终止时间之中单方面并命令他停止运作。

sentences.english: China has surplus funds and power to take unilateral decision but what s about India?
sentences.chinese: 中国的资金过剩，有实力单方面做出决定，印度呢？

definition: persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
a party (in a contract or legal case)/one side/area/region
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
to argue (that)/to allege/to dispute/to plead (e.g. not guilty)
to be in charge/to be confronted (with a matter)/involved (in some matter)
to consider as a matter of importance/to be of importance
main content/matter/work/origin of an incident/cause/purpose/subject (of business letter)
(to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
